EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-234 Close Case With Survey Link
EmailTemplate.name: CloseCaseWithSurveyLink
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUSTOMER CARE
Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
{!Today()}
Dear {!Case.Contact},
The IHS Markit Customer Care Team has completed your request and closed case number {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
If you feel your request is not yet resolved and/or you have any further questions, please quote the above reference number when contacting us.
Please click here to provide your feedback.
Kind regards, IHS Markit Customer Care
{!Case.Thread_Id}
